title: Protocol: Desert Echo
narrative_context: To know the value of water, you must first know thirst. The modern mind is drowning in noise. Your first protocol is a System Purge.

stages.ui_message: The heat is relentless. Do not drink from the noise.

stages.description: The 24 hours have passed. You must verify your actions. The System cannot see you, but the Stone can.

choices.label: I DRANK THE SAND
choices.outcome_text: The desert is harsh. There is no shame in thirst. Rest and try again.

choices.label: I FOUND THE WATER
choices.outcome_text: Silence is the only water that quenches the mind.

artifact.name: Lens of Condensation
artifact.description: A primitive but ingenious method of collecting clarity from the air.
